channel.title: Visualize your data with the Virtual Earth API
channel.description: At the recent MVP summit, I attended a Mash-up lounge event.  It was a bit Web 2.0-ey, but basically they had a bunch of bean bags, fake palm trees, and members of the Windows Live team and some Virtual...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Rob McGovern+00:00
item.description: Martin, it was great to meet you at the MVP summit. Thanks for the beer! I'm a terrible blogger (it's been over a year since my last post) but I love your mashup.
item.dc:creator: Rob McGovern

item.title: Comment by Sam Judson+00:00
item.description: I've checked, and the aerial topography (big word!) for places like the lake district (and even Spain!) is far superior in virtual earth than either yah** or g**gle.
item.dc:creator: Sam Judson
